channel.title: Massacred-world Re-make
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2nc2q8i.png[/img] Hello and welcome to my thread. First off all, i'm going to introduce you too my new project.
This is a PvP server Based from "massacred-world" many of you will know the server "massacred-world" many off you may not. This server is based in Camelot. I havn't really done much at the moment, apart from fix 2 dupes, and remove some useless shit. This will hopefully be a remake, and alot more better than it.
My goals are: [code] -Fix ALL dupes -Clipped Following. -Npc Clipped. -As stable as possible. -Active Forums. -Average player base for 20+. -New miniGames. -Be uniqe. [/code]
Time for a few pictures, like i said: i havn't really done much. so don't go saying shit like "amg leech." Everyone starts somewhere. I AM ALSO USING DEMISE'S PICTURES, BECAUSE I HAVN'T DONE MUCH AND IT'D BE A WASTE OFF TIME.
[img]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/6701/36189570.png[/img]
[img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/4145/81339279.png[/img]
